checkIfAlreadyInserted(int, int, int, int) - Method in class utilities.IntegrityMatrix
This method checks whether the file has a duplicate inside of the token positions part, so if a token position is registered more than once.
checkIfProperCreatedColumn(int, int, int, int) - Method in class utilities.IntegrityMatrix
This method stands against file in which certain elements of the same column but different row are deleted, or modified, by a user.
checkIntegrity(int, int, int, int) - Method in class utilities.IntegrityMatrix
Check if someone tampered the file, so if someone modified any number of rows creating an Illegal State.
checkMatrix - Variable in class utilities.IntegrityMatrix
checkMatrix is private so that it cannot be accessed directly from other classes than this.
